name: Crazy Car Catastrophe
description:
ICT Winter 2020 Game Jam entry

It's the end of the world as your pitted against your friends in a free for all death match! Destroy the most cars before the bomb drops!

Controls:

Right trigger: Go

Left trigger: Stop/reverse

Left stick: Steer

A button: Fire Gatling gun

B button: Fire Rocket

Credits:

Brandon Smith

Kaleb Knoettgen

Eric Baughman

Daniel Johnico
